SENT.plain: Focal nodular hyperplasia of the liver, neoplasia of the brain, and intracranial vascular malformations have recently been described as a new syndrome
We report three cases of focal nodular hyperplasia of the liver with intracranial vascular anomalies
Two patients died from ruptured berry aneurysm
It is important to consider intracranial pathology in patients with focal nodular hyperplasia of the liver
